amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preventing reductions in funding and staffing necessary to respond to, control, and prevent avian flu.

vote.text: Amendment SA 664 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 78.

action.text: Amendment SA 664 proposed by Senator Slotkin. To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to preventing reductions in funding and staffing necessary to respond to, control, and prevent avian flu.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 664 proposed by Senator Slotkin.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 664 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 53. Record Vote Number: 78.
